Excelent Game! buy it it's 5 bucks and will knock your socks off 8/10.

slight difficulty imbalance earlygame, where a little level grinding is required, but it gives you time to learn the controls and enemy tactics on easy. 

But overall it's great, the enemy AI is highly functonial, miles above most other games.

The atmosFEAR is rich and the characters are fun to read about. 

The Modding community is fairly active, and there are some real gems out there, like the shreckrearch.



Although, i do have one issue with this game, a glitch of somesort that makes it so i can't level up in my class. It's making everything rather difficult for me, but fortuantually patches come out quite frequently so i am sure the one real issue i have with this game will be resolved soon, but still.

Buy it.

Vous prenez les ingrédients d'un jeu flash : armes débloquables, arène limitée, tuer X monstres, vous ajoutez de la 3D et une interface ignoble, vous obtiendrez Killing Floor, le jeu flash casual pour hardcore gamers. Il est sympa d'y jouer entre amis de temps en temps, mais le concept montre trop vite ses limites.

Веселый шутер/выживалка для 6 человек достаточно веселый если играть одному на сервере ,но если вы играете с хорошей компанией то веселья и позитивных эмоций после сессии у вас хватит надолгою. Большой арсенал оружия,кишки ,кровь и куча платных дополнений,нет-нет ,дополнения никак не ущемляют игроков играющих в обычную версию игры ну разве что ствол будет обычного цвета а не золотой,да персонажей чуток поменьше ,но к сожалению графика сильно устарела и увидеть 8 полигональное колесо тут тоже труда не составит  ,так что 7/10

One of the best zombie games out there and also with probably the best shotgun pellet mechanics. Killing 'ZED's will massively burn your time without you knowing. Only bad things that I can find this game has is that when it comes to hitboxes(like headshots) in multiplayer, it works in a strange way(as in the game has its own rule for it) and achievement system could have worked out better. But it is still a great game and it is recommended for any hungry zombie killers and I just cannot wait to play Killing Floor 2 any longer.

There are hundreds of popular co-op games to choose from on the steam market, but Killing Floor is one of the few that retains the co-op essence. Unlike other games, Killing Floor heavily reinforces teamwork, communication, and offers multiple unique roles to players that are actually necessary and useful. 

The game also discourages wanton recklessness and the typical CoD mindset. Suffice it to say, there will still be outliers and stupid people. Whether they're scavenging, greedily hoarding kills/money and overextending, or simply running off into the wilderness unarmed, there's bound to be one of them every once in a while, attempting to ruin the session for everyone else. 

Killing Floor attempts to creates an ultimatum where you can join forces or die alone. While you might not like who you're paired up with, the game will force you to work with them using the impending threat of a swift death.

In a world of boring CoD-esque first-person shooters , KF1 is a light in the darkness.

Сейчас я напишу пару слов о Killing Floor.Игра опять же кооперативная.Но она даже не конкурент для L4D.Опять же я не спорю в этой игре есть вещи которых нет в L4D.Сейчас рассмотрим поподробнее.1.Сюжет.Сюжета как такого нет,просто выживание.(до определенной волны)2.Графика.Графика в этой игре вообще ужасная,даже движок Source графонистее чем этот ужас.Напомню игра вышла через год после L4D.3.Геймплей.Заключается в выживании и покупке оружия.И из всего что я назвал ничего хорошего нету.А в чем же мне игра понравилась?1.Огромный арсенал оружия.2.Стрельба по-македонски(akimbo или с двух рук)3.Вполне вменяемые карты.4.Классы.5.Куча моделек для персонажей. В итоге 6\10.Да все круто,но графика все таки позорная.

10/10

If you want a fun zombie killing shooter you can't look past this game. Fulfill all your gore needs as you dispatch each infected with dicapitations and dismemberment. With loads of weapons to buy in-game you'll never get bored, wanna blow a zombie straight to hell with a .50 calibur sniper why the boody hell not. This game also has multiplayer so you and your friends can enjoy the carnage together. Overall this game is very fun ands fast paced, there is definitely a lot of fun to be had. Oh don't forget funny, the survivors have the most hilarious dialogue. I would totally recommend this game to anyone who wants nothing more than to raise hell against the undead.
